item.title: Tonya add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Tonya add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Tonya add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Tonya add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Where there is love there is life." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Tonya add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The intuitive mind is a sacred gift and the rational mind is a faithful servant. We have created a society that honors the servant and has forgotten the gift." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Tonya add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Tonya add a quote by Marianne Williamson
item.description: "Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our light, not our darkness that most frightens us. We ask ourselves, 'Who am I to be brilliant, gorgeous, talented, fabulous?' Actually, who are you not to be? You are a child of God. Your playing small does not serve the world. There is nothing enlightened about shrinking so that other people won't feel insecure around you. We are all meant to shine, as children do. We were born to make manifest the glory of God that is within us. It's not just in some of us; it's in everyone. And as we let our own light shine, we unconsciously give other people permission to do the same. As we are liberated from our own fear, our presence automatically liberates others." -- Marianne Williamson

item.title: Tonya add a quote by Marianne Williamson
item.description: "Joy is what happens to us when we allow ourselves to recognize how good things really are." -- Marianne Williamson

item.title: Tonya add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud. It is not rude, it is not self-seeking, it is not easily angered, it keeps no record of wrongs. Love does not delight in evil but rejoices with the truth. It always protects, always trusts, always hopes, always perseveres." -- Anonymous

item.title: Tonya add a quote by Gary Zukav
item.description: "Eventually, you will come to understand that love heals everything, and love is all there is." -- Gary Zukav

item.title: Tonya add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "Imagine how our own families, let alone the world, would change if we vowed to keep faith with one another, strengthen one another, look for and accentuate the virtues in one another, and speak graciously concerning one another. Imagine the cumulative effect if we treated each other with respect and acceptance, if we willingly provided support. Such interactions practiced on a small scale would surely have a rippling effect throughout our homes and communities and, eventually, society at large." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Tonya add a quote by Cary Grant
item.description: "I began by acting like the person I wanted to be, and eventually I became that person." -- Cary Grant

item.title: Tonya add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "There are two basic motivating forces: fear and love. When we are afraid, we pull back from life. When we are in love, we open to all that life has to offer with passion, excitement, and acceptance. We need to learn to love ourselves first, in all our glory and our imperfections. If we cannot love ourselves, we cannot fully open to our ability to love others or our potential to create. Evolution and all hopes for a better world rest in the fearlessness and open-hearted vision of people who embrace life." -- John Lennon

item.title: Tonya add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "The more we let God take us over, the more truly ourselves we become - because He made us. He invented us. He invented all the different people that you and I were intended to be. . .It is when I turn to Christ, when I give up myself to His personality, that I first begin to have a real personality of my own." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Tonya add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Tonya add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Tonya add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Tonya add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Tonya add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are." -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: Tonya add a quote by Philip Reeve
item.description: "Sometimes, on our way through the world, we meet someone who touches our heart in a way others don't." -- Philip Reeve

item.title: Tonya add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "God never slams a door in your face without opening a box of Girl Scout cookies." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Tonya add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "We don't realize that, somewhere within us all, there does exist a supreme self who is eternally at peace." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Tonya add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "God dwells within you, as you." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Tonya add a quote by Terry Fox
item.description: "I believe in miracles.... I have to." -- Terry Fox

item.title: Tonya add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "When you do things from your soul, you feel a river moving in you, a joy." -- Rumi

item.title: Tonya add a quote by Charles Eisenstein
item.description: "Even the most thorough change happens once choice at a time" -- Charles Eisenstein

item.title: Tonya add a quote by Charles Eisenstein
item.description: "We are all here to contribute our gifts toward something greater than ourselves, and will never be content unless we are." -- Charles Eisenstein
